channel.title: Work on aswin's blog

item.title: Notes from my first workplace as an employee
item.description:
Hey, we’re back.

The cadence of these notes will vary like a meandering river as it was not easy to connect different things and also keep the same voice â€“ “I am not an expert; I’m just writing it down as I fare forward and figure it out” throughout the blog. I also feel this blog post lacks a certain standard of emotional density that I thought this would have when I envisioned writing it. Nevertheless, the deliverables of an average blog post on this site: candid accounts of experiences and reflections, with an edge for optimism, can be easily observed even by the accidental audience on this blog post.
